column5: Looking for resorts, lodges, campgrounds or other business's in NW Ontario? Look into "Kenora's Outdoor Network." This site has the names, addresses and phone numbers of all biz from Kenora to Red Lake down to Rainy River with links as we located them found.http://www.kenoraontario.net(note-if you are a biz in these communities and not listed, please e-mail me at the address noted. With details, and www. address.):)
